attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Making prostitution legal will protect people, and stop the trafficing of people for sex in this country. It would be easy to control as you could regulate it to minmiase STD's which will save the NHS money aswell as gaining tax off it, and take people off the streets. It will also free up police time for the real crimes.

rejection.details: You will need to correct the spelling in the title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
